Docs.typeparam: The data type of the target entity.
Docs.summary: Provides for deferred loading and relationship maintenance for the collection side of one-to-many and one-to-one relationships in a LINQ to SQL applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is used in combination with <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntityRef%601>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following C# sample shows one use of this method:
``` var customer = (from c in db.Customers where c.CustomerID == "ALFKI" select c).Single();
Order[] orderArray = new Order[customer.Orders.Count]; ```
customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray,0);In Visual Basic:
``` Dim customer = (From c In db.Customers _ Where c.CustomerID = "ALFKI" _ Select c).[Single]()
Dim orderArray As Order() = New Order(customer.Orders.Count - 1) {} customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray, 0) ```
